title: Making America Beautiful Again by Improving Our National Parks
summary: The document is an executive order titled "Making America Beautiful Again by Improving Our National Parks," issued on July 3, 2025. The order aims to preserve and enhance national parks by increasing entry fees for foreign tourists, improving affordability for U.S. residents, and expanding recreational opportunities. The Secretary of the Interior is directed to develop strategies to increase revenue from nonresident fees and use the additional funds to improve park infrastructure and services. The order also encourages international tourism, reviews maintenance backlogs, and aims to increase visitor capacity. Additionally, it revokes a previous presidential memorandum and outlines general provisions for implementation.
